TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit HttpListenerException extends System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown when an error occurs processing an HTTP request.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This exception is thrown by the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> class and its associated classes when an error occurs during initialization of the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> or while creating or sending a response to an HTTP request. For example, this exception is thrown if the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> attempts to register a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) prefix that is already registered.
**Associated Tips**
Make sure you are not attempting to register a URI prefix that is already registered. If the URI prefix is already registered, this exception will occur.
Make sure your HTTP request is valid. This exception is thrown by the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> class and its associated classes when an error occurs during the initialization of the <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> or while creating or sending a response to an HTTP request.
If you are using the `HttpListenerPrefixCollection.Add` method, make sure the `uriPrefix` has not been already added. This exception will be thrown if another <xref:System.Net.HttpListener> has already added the prefix `uriPrefix`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor sets the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerException.ErrorCode%2A> and <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> properties using the most recent Windows error.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 errorCode) cil managed

Docs.param: A <xref:System.Int32> value that identifies the error that occurred.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified error code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of `errorCode` is used to set the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerException.ErrorCode%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 errorCode, string message) cil managed

Docs.param: A <xref:System.Int32> value that identifies the error that occurred.
A <xref:System.String> that describes the error that occurred.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified error code and message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of `errorCode` is used to set the <xref:System.Net.HttpListenerException.ErrorCode%2A> property. The `message` parameter is used to set the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo serializationInfo, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext streamingContext) cil managed

Docs.param: A object that contains the information required to deserialize the new object.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified instances of the and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> classes.
Gets a value that identifies the error that occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property returns the Windows error code associated with this exception.
